short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick access extension for safe search sites for kids.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your educational experience with our SafeSearch Extension. This Chrome extension provides quick access to two trusted educational search engines: https://www.safesearch.tips and https://www.digr.co . Ideal for educators, schools, and classrooms, our extension prioritizes educational websites, ensuring a safe and focused learning environment. By leveraging advanced Google SafeSearch technology, it effectively blocks adult content, providing peace of mind for teachers and parents alike. Simplify your search for quality educational resources with our SafeSearch Extension today.
